title: JavaScript
subTitle: Core language for dynamic web applications
overviewContent: Proficient in core JavaScript, I apply in-depth knowledge of ES5 and ES6+ features to build efficient, maintainable, and scalable web applications. This solid foundation in vanilla JavaScript enables seamless integration with libraries and frameworks such as React, Next.js, and jQuery. facilitating the creation of complex, interactive user interfaces. I consistently optimise JavaScript code to ensure smooth performance across desktop, tablet, and mobile platforms, delivering high-quality, professional web experiences.
